General.Name: Dongwoo Farm To Table Co.Ltd
General.Description: Dongwoo Farm To Table Co.,Ltd engages in the hatching, breeding, feeding, slaughtering, processing, and distribution of chicken in South Korea. It offers fresh, frozen, special, processed, and environment friendly chicken products. The company was formerly known as Dongwoo Co Ltd and changed its name to Dongwoo Farm To Table Co.,Ltd in March 2017. Dongwoo Farm To Table Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Gunsan-si, South Korea.
